content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see my apartment, Mr. Li. I appreciate your interest in renting it. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains, so I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What are your thoughts on the price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I don't have any information about the rental price yet. Can you tell me what the average rental price in this area is?

Also, I want to make sure that the apartment is in good condition and that the landlord is reliable. Can you tell me more about your experience with being a landlord?

Lastly, do you have any other requirements for the rental agreement?
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Certainly, Mr. Li. The average rental price in this area for a 25-square-meter apartment is around €700-€800 per month. As for my experience as a landlord, I have been renting out properties for over 10 years, and I have a good track record of maintaining them in good condition and being reliable.

In terms of requirements for the rental agreement, I would like to see a security deposit of at least one month's rent, as well as a clause that outlines the responsibilities of both parties in terms of maintaining the property. Additionally, I would like the agreement to include a provision that allows me to increase the rent at the end of the lease term, based on market conditions. Let me know if you have any questions or concerns about these requirements.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €750 per month, with a one-month security deposit.

Regarding the rental agreement, I have a few questions. Can you provide me with a sample agreement that I can review and sign?

Also, do you have any other requirements for the rental agreement, such as the length of the lease term?

Lastly, do you have any references that I can contact to verify your reliability as a landlord?

Thank you for your time and consideration, Mr. Heine.

TERMINATE.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Mr. Li. I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of €750 per month with a one-month security deposit.

Regarding the rental agreement, I can provide you with a sample agreement that you can review and sign. The length of the lease term is negotiable, but I generally prefer to rent out my properties on a one-year lease term.

As for references, I have several tenants who have rented from me in the past and can provide you with their contact information if you would like to verify my reliability as a landlord.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns, and I will be happy to assist you further.
name: Heinrich Heine
